title: Dialogflow - Retail prebuilt playbook agent
abstract:
# Dialogflow - Retail prebuilt playbook agent
**Note:** This feature has limited access. Contact your Google Cloud account team to request access for this feature and to access the API reference documentation.
The Retail [prebuilt playbook agent](/dialogflow/vertex/docs/concept/prebuilt-agent) allows users to search for items, get product recommendations, and place an order.
content:
## Sample dialogs
The following sample dialogs demonstrate common scenarios handled by this prebuilt agent.
### Search products and purchase items
User asks about watches available in the store. The agent recommends products that meet this criteria, and the user adds them to their shopping cart. The user confirms that they would like to place an order, and the agent confirms the order with a confirmation number. The user then requests phone recommendations and the agent suggests phones, adds one to the user's cart, and places an order for the user.
| User input           | Agent response                           |
|:---------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| hi             | nan                              |
| nan            | Hi, I'm your Google shopping assistant. I can help you search for items and place orders. How can I help you today?  |
| what watches do you have       | nan                              |
| nan            | We have the Google Watch. Would you like to add it to your cart?              |
| yes add two please         | nan                              |
| nan            | You got it. I've added two Google Watches to your cart. Anything else?             |
| can you add one Google Pixel 8 to my cart as well? | nan                              |
| nan            | You got it. I've added one Google Pixel 8 to your cart. Anything else?             |
| what's in my cart?         | nan                              |
| nan            | You have one Google Pixel 8 and two Google Watches in your cart. Would you like to check out?       |
| yes please           | nan                              |
| nan            | Okay, I've placed an order containing one Google Pixel 8 and two Google Watches. Your confirmation number is QKA67DW2. |
| nan            | Is there anything else I can help you with today?                  |
| actually can you help me find a new phone too?  | nan                              |
| nan            | We have the Google Phone Pixel 8, and Google Phone Pixel 7, would you like to purchase one of these?     |
| yes, give me a Pixel 8        | nan                              |
| nan            | You got it. I've added one Google Phone Pixel 8 to your cart. Anything else?           |
| no we can check out        | nan                              |
| nan            | You have one Google Phone Pixel 8 in your cart. Would you like to check out using this cart?       |
| yes            | nan                              |
| nan            | Okay, I've placed an order for you. Your order contains one Google Phone Pixel 8. Your confirmation number is Y43KTF0T. |
| nan            | Is there anything else I can help you with today?                  |
| no that's all for me, thanks      | nan                              |
| nan            | Okay, thank you for shopping with Google! Have a nice day.                |
### Cart management
The user asks to add some items to their cart, then removes one before placing an order.
| User input       | Agent response                      |
|:-------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| hi I want to buy a phone    | nan                         |
| nan         | We have the Google Phone Pixel 8 and Google Phone Pixel 7. Which one would you like to purchase?  |
| give me two of the 8     | nan                         |
| nan         | You got it. I've added two Google Phone Pixel 8 to your cart. Anything else?       |
| actually can you remove one of them? | nan                         |
| nan         | Sure, I've removed one Google Phone Pixel 8 from your cart. Anything else?       |
| I'm ready to place my order   | nan                         |
| nan         | Okay, I've placed an order containing one Google Phone Pixel 8. Your confirmation number is X0KP6K5T. |
| nan         | Is there anything else I can help you with today?              |
| no, that's it      | nan                         |
| nan         | Okay, thank you for shopping with Google! Have a nice day.           |
### Product not found
The user asks about a product that is not carried by the store.
| User input    | Agent response                          |
|:--------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| hi      | nan                             |
| nan      | Hi, I'm your Google shopping assistant. I can help you search for items and place orders. How can I help you today? |
| I want to buy a car  | nan                             |
| nan      | Sorry, we don't have any cars in stock. Is there anything else you'd like to find?         |
| yeah, what about watches? | nan                             |
| nan      | We have the Google Watch. Would you like to add it to your cart?             |
| no thanks     | nan                             |
| nan      | Is there anything else I can help you with today?                 |
| nope      | nan                             |
| nan      | Okay, thank you for shopping with Google! Have a nice day.               |
### Unrecognized input
User asks about a topic unrelated to products or ordering. Agent responds by repeating what topics the agent covers, and asks the user what they would like help with.
| User input    | Agent response                                        |
|:-----------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| hi      | nan                                           |
| nan     | Hi, I'm your Google shopping assistant. I can help you search for items and place orders. How can I help you today?               |
| I want to book a hotel | nan                                           |
| nan     | Sorry, I can't help you with that. I can help you search for products including phones, watches, and headphones. I can also help you place orders. How can I help you today? |
## Basic setup
To set up this prebuilt agent:
- [Import the prebuilt agent](/dialogflow/vertex/docs/concept/prebuilt-agent#import) .
- Configure the provided [tools](/dialogflow/vertex/docs/concept/tools) with your external services, see [Tool setup](#tool-setup) .## Tool setup
This agent includes [tools](/dialogflow/vertex/docs/concept/tools) that are used to integrate with external services. You can use the prebuilt tool installer to deploy sample code and data for your prebuilt agent.### Google Store API
The `Google Store API` tool is used to fetch items from the Google Store based on a search term.
### Manage shopping cart
The `Manage Shopping Cart` tool allows the user to manage their shopping cart by viewing all items in the cart, adding items to the cart, and removing items from the cart.
### Place order
The `Place Order` tool is used to place an order with the user's current shopping cart and returns a confirmation number for the order placed.
### Complete
Your agent and its integrations should now be set up and ready to test.
